Physical Exam:
Pre-Op exam:
On exam: he appears to be in no acute distress, well nourished. He is alert and oriented to person, place, and time. PERRL, EOM intact without nystagmus, face symmetric, tongue midline, facial strength and sensation intact, hearing intact to voice, speech is clear and fluent, comprehension intact, no pronator drift, no Romberg, heel to shin intact, and tandem gait intact. Visual fields showed a lateral gaze deficit. He moves all extremities with full strength, normal tone and bulk. Gait is normal.
